topic.title: Can we host torrents here?
topic.body: I was wondering whether we could host torrents here

1554908088_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body: Well it has already killed REAL relations between people. Not much time left before we forget ourselves also

1555302116_1FUAYb5srAuXuzNsKKtbd6cpNfQbE.body:
> [zork13](#comment_3_1G9RYbBYc3VpmPLoEPbmFgvH6j5CEpg4yy): You're welcome. A decentralized torrent platform is what led me to zeronet.

Can these torrents be downloaded using softwares like qbittorrent? I am somewhat new to the concept of decentralization, so..
